title: malai upadEshattin
sahitya:
malai upadEshattin mANikka jyOtiyE vAnarasAna nidhiyE parama patiyE


anupallavi

  nilai perum Anmikak-kalai tarum inbamE ninnai ninaittavarkku nErumO tunbamE


caraNam    Ezhaikk-iranguginra tOzhA pirar innalaiat-tIr arivALA kOzhai accamillAda dhIrA vairAgyak-kozhundena 
viLangiya vIrA vAzhaiyaDi vAzhaiyAi manu kulam anbuDan vAzhvE siluvaiyil vAzhvai bali IndAi
